[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@thi.ng/rstream](./rstream.md) &gt; [TunnelOpts](./rstream.tunnelopts.md)

## TunnelOpts interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TunnelOpts<A> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [id](./rstream.tunnelopts.id.md) | <code>string</code> | Optional subscription ID to use. |
|  [interrupt](./rstream.tunnelopts.interrupt.md) | <code>boolean</code> | If true, the worker will be terminated and restarted for each new stream value. This is useful to avoid executing extraneous work and ensures only the most rececent stream value is being processed.<!-- -->Default: false |
|  [maxWorkers](./rstream.tunnelopts.maxworkers.md) | <code>number</code> | Max. number of worker instances to use. Only useful if <code>interrupt</code> is disabled. If more than one is used, incoming stream values will be assigned to workers in a round robin order. Workers will be instantiated on demand.<!-- -->Default: 1 |
|  [src](./rstream.tunnelopts.src.md) | <code>Worker &#124; Blob &#124; string</code> | Tunnelled worker instance, source blob or script URL. If <code>interrupt</code> is enabled, the worker MUST be given as blob or URL. |
|  [terminate](./rstream.tunnelopts.terminate.md) | <code>number</code> | If given and greater than zero, all workers will be terminated after given period (in millis) after the parent stream is done.<!-- -->Default: 1000 |
|  [transferables](./rstream.tunnelopts.transferables.md) | <code>Fn&lt;A, any[]&gt;</code> | Optional function to extract transferables from incoming stream values, e.g. ArrayBuffers. See: [https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Worker/postMessage](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Worker/postMessage) |
